issue.title: [C++] Update linting and formatting scripts to specify python3 in shebang line
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13759](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13759). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently the script in `cpp/build-support/run_clang_format.py` requires modifying to run on any machines/environments where the shebang line `#!/usr/bin/env python` finds the system python2 instead of python3.   

Updating the shebang line to read `python3` instead of `python` would fix this.
